page.title: 03TRANSPORT
page.content: A survey was taken on the A12. The traffic is heavy on the by pass. On the bank holiday weekend there were 22 coaches westbound in one hour as against 3 in the middle of the week. We also counted an average of l387 cars in 2 separate hour long traffic surveys taken over 2 days. There were about 300 lorries on each day. The traffic was very heavy. Drivers of lorries travelled a high speed and often too close together. The overall impression is that the driving was not of a high standard especially considering one day was wet. Most of the traffic on the A128 is greatest on Friday. There are 200 cars per day, few buses or lorries and even fewer articulated lorries.
